00021     public static function uuid() {
00022         $node = MOC::env('SERVER_ADDR');
00023         $pid = null;
00024 
00025         if (strpos($node, ':') !== false) {
00026             if (substr_count($node, '::')) {
00027                 $node = str_replace('::', str_repeat(':0000', 8 - substr_count($node, ':')) . ':', $node);
00028             }
00029             $node = explode(':', $node);
00030             $ipv6 = '';
00031 
00032             foreach ($node as $id) {
00033                 $ipv6 .= str_pad(base_convert($id, 16, 2), 16, 0, STR_PAD_LEFT);
00034             }
00035             $node = base_convert($ipv6, 2, 10);
00036 
00037             if (strlen($node) < 38) {
00038                 $node = null;
00039             } else {
00040                 $node = crc32($node);
00041             }
00042         } elseif (empty($node)) {
00043             $host = MOC::env('HOSTNAME');
00044 
00045             if (empty($host)) {
00046                 $host = MOC::env('HOST');
00047             }
00048 
00049             if (!empty($host)) {
00050                 $ip = gethostbyname($host);
00051 
00052                 if ($ip === $host) {
00053                     $node = crc32($host);
00054                 } else {
00055                     $node = ip2long($ip);
00056                 }
00057             }
00058         } elseif ($node !== '127.0.0.1') {
00059             $node = ip2long($node);
00060         } else {
00061             $node = null;
00062         }
00063 
00064         if (empty($node)) {
00065             $node = crc32(Configure::read('Security.salt'));
00066         }
00067 
00068         if (function_exists('zend_thread_id')) {
00069             $pid = zend_thread_id();
00070         } else {
00071             $pid = getmypid();
00072         }
00073 
00074         if (!$pid || $pid > 65535) {
00075             $pid = mt_rand(0, 0xfff) | 0x4000;
00076         }
00077 
00078         list($timeMid, $timeLow) = explode(' ', microtime());
00079         $uuid = sprintf("%08x-%04x-%04x-%02x%02x-%04x%08x", (int)$timeLow, (int)substr($timeMid, 2) & 0xffff, mt_rand(0, 0xfff) | 0x4000, mt_rand(0, 0x3f) | 0x80, mt_rand(0, 0xff), $pid, $node);
00080 
00081         return $uuid;
00082     }
00093     public static function tokenize($data, $separator = ',', $leftBound = '(', $rightBound = ')') {
00094         if (empty($data) || is_array($data)) {
00095             return $data;
00096         }
00097 
00098         $depth = 0;
00099         $offset = 0;
00100         $buffer = '';
00101         $results = array();
00102         $length = strlen($data);
00103         $open = false;
00104 
00105         while ($offset <= $length) {
00106             $tmpOffset = -1;
00107             $offsets = array(strpos($data, $separator, $offset), strpos($data, $leftBound, $offset), strpos($data, $rightBound, $offset));
00108             for ($i = 0; $i < 3; $i++) {
00109                 if ($offsets[$i] !== false && ($offsets[$i] < $tmpOffset || $tmpOffset == -1)) {
00110                     $tmpOffset = $offsets[$i];
00111                 }
00112             }
00113             if ($tmpOffset !== -1) {
00114                 $buffer .= substr($data, $offset, ($tmpOffset - $offset));
00115                 if ($data{$tmpOffset} == $separator && $depth == 0) {
00116                     $results[] = $buffer;
00117                     $buffer = '';
00118                 } else {
00119                     $buffer .= $data{$tmpOffset};
00120                 }
00121                 if ($leftBound != $rightBound) {
00122                     if ($data{$tmpOffset} == $leftBound) {
00123                         $depth++;
00124                     }
00125                     if ($data{$tmpOffset} == $rightBound) {
00126                         $depth--;
00127                     }
00128                 } else {
00129                     if ($data{$tmpOffset} == $leftBound) {
00130                         if (!$open) {
00131                             $depth++;
00132                             $open = true;
00133                         } else {
00134                             $depth--;
00135                             $open = false;
00136                         }
00137                     }
00138                 }
00139                 $offset = ++$tmpOffset;
00140             } else {
00141                 $results[] = $buffer . substr($data, $offset);
00142                 $offset = $length + 1;
00143             }
00144         }
00145         if (empty($results) && !empty($buffer)) {
00146             $results[] = $buffer;
00147         }
00148 
00149         if (!empty($results)) {
00150             $data = array_map('trim', $results);
00151         } else {
00152             $data = array();
00153         }
00154         return $data;
00155     }
00177     public static function insert($str, $data, $options = array()) {
00178         $defaults = array('before' => ':', 'after' => null, 'escape' => '\\', 'format' => null, 'clean' => false);
00179         $options += $defaults;
00180         $format = $options['format'];
00181 
00182         if (!isset($format)) {
00183             $format = sprintf('/(?<!%s)%s%%s%s/', preg_quote($options['escape'], '/'), str_replace('%', '%%', preg_quote($options['before'], '/')), str_replace('%', '%%', preg_quote($options['after'], '/')));
00184         }
00185         if (!is_array($data)) {
00186             $data = array($data);
00187         }
00188 
00189         if (array_keys($data) === array_keys(array_values($data))) {
00190             $offset = 0;
00191             while (($pos = strpos($str, '?', $offset)) !== false) {
00192                 $val = array_shift($data);
00193                 $offset = $pos + strlen($val);
00194                 $str = substr_replace($str, $val, $pos, 1);
00195             }
00196         } else {
00197             asort($data);
00198 
00199             $hashKeys = array_map('md5', array_keys($data));
00200             $tempData = array_combine(array_keys($data), array_values($hashKeys));
00201             foreach ($tempData as $key => $hashVal) {
00202                 $key = sprintf($format, preg_quote($key, '/'));
00203                 $str = preg_replace($key, $hashVal, $str);
00204             }
00205             $dataReplacements = array_combine($hashKeys, array_values($data));
00206             foreach ($dataReplacements as $tmpHash => $data) {
00207                 $str = str_replace($tmpHash, $data, $str);
00208             }
00209         }
00210 
00211         if (!isset($options['format']) && isset($options['before'])) {
00212             $str = str_replace($options['escape'] . $options['before'], $options['before'], $str);
00213         }
00214         if (!$options['clean']) {
00215             return $str;
00216         }
00217         return string ::cleanInsert($str, $options);
00218     }
00230     public static function cleanInsert($str, $options) {
00231         $clean = $options['clean'];
00232         if (!$clean) {
00233             return $str;
00234         }
00235         if ($clean === true) {
00236             $clean = array('method' => 'text');
00237         }
00238         if (!is_array($clean)) {
00239             $clean = array('method' => $options['clean']);
00240         }
00241         switch ($clean['method']) {
00242             case 'html':
00243                 $clean = array_merge(array('word' => '[\w,.]+', 'andText' => true, 'replacement' => '', ), $clean);
00244                 $kleenex = sprintf('/[\s]*[a-z]+=(")(%s%s%s[\s]*)+\\1/i', preg_quote($options['before'], '/'), $clean['word'], preg_quote($options['after'], '/'));
00245                 $str = preg_replace($kleenex, $clean['replacement'], $str);
00246                 if ($clean['andText']) {
00247                     $options['clean'] = array('method' => 'text');
00248                     $str = string ::cleanInsert($str, $options);
00249                 }
00250                 break;
00251             case 'text':
00252                 $clean = array_merge(array('word' => '[\w,.]+', 'gap' => '[\s]*(?:(?:and|or)[\s]*)?', 'replacement' => '', ), $clean);
00253 
00254                 $kleenex = sprintf('/(%s%s%s%s|%s%s%s%s)/', preg_quote($options['before'], '/'), $clean['word'], preg_quote($options['after'], '/'), $clean['gap'], $clean['gap'], preg_quote($options['before'], '/'), $clean['word'], preg_quote($options['after'], '/'));
00255                 $str = preg_replace($kleenex, $clean['replacement'], $str);
00256                 break;
00257         }
00258         return $str;
00259     }
